value.title: Quickly create Power BI reports in Power BI Service
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session to demonstrate the new feature which is just been rolled out by Microsoft. Now, we can quickly create reports using the Power BI Service itself. We don’t need to open the Power BI Desktop for the same. This new feature is being rolled out from December 2020 Power BI
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9vAtJHVmCVI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Relative Time Slicer in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, we will discuss the new feature rolled out during the April 2020 Update of Power BI Desktop.  Now, we can add  Time Slicer with the OOTB date filter in Power BI.   With Relative Time Slicer, we can filter data based on the time.  Sometimes there are situations, where we need to filter
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hspRabT_JkU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Remove or Unpublish “Publish to Web” Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this video, we will talk the procedure of removing a Power BI report after it has been publishing to web and anonymously accessed on web.  Sometimes, there is a situation where we have published a report with web option and generated iframe code to embed the report in our custom application. Now,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/l1sqT7upHjs" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Resolve “Contact your admin to enable code creation” Error while using Publish to web option
value.excerpt: In this video, we will talk about how we can resolve an error – “Contact your admin to enable code creation”. value.title: A better way to share Personal Bookmarks in Power BI
value.excerpt: A while back Adam shared how you can share a personal bookmark with others. There is now a better way to share personal bookmarks in Power BI if your report is in a workspace. Learn how!  Share Power BI reports and dashboards with coworkers and others https://learn.microsoft.com/power-bi/collaborate-share/service-share-dashboards

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI

value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files.
